alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 15 at 10:44AM MST until December 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Corson County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
